title: NewsBreak: Disney to Ban Netflix Ads as Streaming War Heats Up - WSJ
text:
NewsBreak: Disney to Ban Netflix Ads as Streaming War Heats Up - WSJ

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Oct 04, 2019 22:56)

© Reuters. Investing.com - Disney is to ban ads for Netflix (NASDAQ: ) from all of its channels, the Wall Street Journal reported, as the rivalry between the two gets increasingly direct. Disney announced it will launch its new streaming service, Disney+, in November. The news comes a day after the WSJ also reported Disney's arguing with Amazon.com (NASDAQ: ) over how much advertising Disney content should carry on Amazon's Fire streaming devices. Walt Disney (NYSE: ) shares up 1.0%; they're up 18% year to date. Netflix (NASDAQ: ) shares down 0.1%. They've fallen 10% this year as others have encroached on its turf.

NewsBreak: Disney to Ban Netflix Ads as Streaming War Heats Up - WSJ
